name: Jump! Let's jumping in the sky,Mr jumper!
name_original: Jump! Let's jumping in the sky,Mr jumper!
description:
Adam missed Eden pistachios! Come and become a handsome Adam, defeat various monsters highway, jump to the beautiful Garden of Eden!

Game Features:
1. Cute character,easy to control
2. Beautiful Scene & Shock Effects
3. Kill Monster,exciting ...

Gameplay:

1. Single-finger touch screen, left and right movement to control direction ~
2. Tap the screen to trigger double jump, kill monsters and release energy elf ~
3. Activate the shield can withstand the monster hurt ~
...

Tips:
1. Character jumping in the rolling sky,reach the end,the sky will flip.
2. You can pickup coins,then use coin to upgrade the character,props and open chest.
3. Jump! one of top games new games and flying games,make by letendo.
4. Different metho to kill different monster.
